item.title: We Code in the Context of our Quoting
item.description: This article can be listened too here or in your favorite podcast player Whether you are working Waterfall, or Agile we still need to quote out the time it will take for new features . We still need to give the product owners, or the people with the money, a sense of timing. And it is this skill or lack thereof that drives the experience we are going to have when we code.
